channel.title: Custom Models: Asrith's Hilt, Asrith's Scimitar!
channel.description:
hellooo, today i made this hilt and scimmy because its a design that i made while i was bored so i figured i might as well create it! well anyways im planning to make a npc called asrith but the only problem is i dont know how to animate npc's well i mean ive used rsposer but i dont know how to change the skins and stuff, well idk if someone can give me advice on stuff like that i'd greatly appreciate it. but anyways leave opinions below thanks!
the hilt:
[IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh555/wthsquids/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20ALEX-PC/7712d18e.jpg[/img]
the scimmy:
[IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh555/wthsquids/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20ALEX-PC/54250eb8.jpg[/img]
another picture of the scimmy:
[IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh555/wthsquids/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20ALEX-PC/8b99a5e0.jpg[/img]
